recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Meanwhile, heat a pan and cook the pancetta with the garlic. Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese. Combine everything together, add some pasta water if necessary, and season with pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Heat a pan and cook the pancetta with the garlic until crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix with grated pecorino and parmesan cheese.
Combine the cooked spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture together in the pan.
Add some pasta water to reach the desired consistency.
Season with freshly ground black pepper.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok. Add onion and garlic, cook until softened. Add bell peppers, zucchini, and broccoli, stir fry until tender-crisp. Stir in soy sauce, hoisin sauce, and sesame oil. Serve over rice or noodles.
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add sliced onion and minced garlic, cook until softened.
Add sliced bell peppers, zucchini, and broccoli florets, stir fry until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce, hoisin sauce, and sesame oil, mix well.
Serve the stir fry over cooked rice or noodles.

steps: Cream together the butter and both sugars until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the batter along with the salt.
Stir in flour, chocolate chips, and chopped walnuts (if using).
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased baking pans.
Bake for about 10 minutes, or until the edges are nicely browned.
